page.title: 12AGRICULTURE B.ASH/C.FENTON
page.content: Some animals are kept under {intensive}conditions.The most common are beef cattle,calves,sheep and pigs.On Rose Farm,C.F. 108 beef cattle are kept.Most animals are sold at auctions at Wetherby and York. Farmers work long hours,8 to 12 hours each day.Busiest time of year is harvesting for arable farmers and lambing for livestock rearers.Most seem contented in job and if had the opportunity to choose again would still be farmers. None had problems of vandalism. Rabbits and crows are causing damage to young grain crops.Farmers use crop rotation as soils vary between limestone and heavy clay.Most farmers have drained land using plastic pipes.New straw burning laws encourage farmers to plough stubble into the land.
